name: get_panchanga
description: Calculate the Hindu Panchanga (calendar) for a specific date and location. Returns details like Tithi, Nakshatra, Yoga, Karana, Vara, Sunrise, and Sunset.

latitude.description: The latitude of the location (e.g., 33.1507 for Frisco, TX).

longitude.description: The longitude of the location (e.g., -96.8236 for Frisco, TX).

timezone.description: The timezone offset from UTC (e.g., -6.0 for CST, 5.5 for IST).

year.description: The year for the calculation (optional, defaults to current year).

month.description: The month for the calculation (1-12) (optional, defaults to current month).

day.description: The day of the month for the calculation (optional, defaults to current day).

location_name.description: A human-readable name for the location (e.g., 'Frisco, TX').

name: get_sankalpam
description: Generates the Sankalpam mantra string for a specific date and location, including Samvatsara, Ayana, Ritu, Masa, Paksha, Tithi, Vara, and Nakshatra.

name: get_sankalpam_voice
description: Generates an audio file (MP3) of the Sankalpam mantra for a specific date and location. Returns the file path and text.
